text:
I have cancelled the second office hour tomorrow as I realised I will be travelling and won't be able to make it. So just one office hour this month:

:loudspeaker: Contributor Office Hour, Thursday December 12

Join an online Office Hour to
 - discuss how to get started contributing to R
 - get help/feedback on contributions you are working on
 - look at open bugs/work on translations together

EMEA/APAC, 10:00-11:00 UTC: <https://www.meetup.com/r-contributors/events/304705594>
